## Upcoming Meeting: September 26, 2019

Our next StatChat is Thursday September 26, 2019 from 6:00--8:00pm at Macalester College (Olin-Rice 301). The agenda for the meeting will include:

- **6:00&ndash;6:30 Settle In &amp; Eat**

- **6:30&ndash;7:45 Guest Speaker:** [Tim Erickson](https://www.eeps.com/tim.html) will present on the using the [Common Online Data Analysis Platform (CODAP)](https://codap.concord.org/). _Be sure to bring your computer as this will be an interactive session._

- **7:45&ndash;8:00:** Discussion, wrap-up, and future StatChats

We hope to see you there!  If you plan to attend, [please RSVP by signing up to bring food or beverage to share](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Y09XZuKQyMPYnLZKgNV8cs2Bu3wY6Vr-Q1ZvM_8lUpE/edit#gid=0).  And please spread the word among any colleagues that may be interested in the night's topics.

## October 30, 2019 Meeting

The October StatChat will be Wedesday October 30, 2019 from 6:00--8:00pm at Macalester College (Olin-Rice TBA). The agenda for the meeting will include:

- **6:00&ndash;6:30 Settle In &amp; Eat**

- **6:30&ndash;7:45 Guest Speaker:** [Kris Gorman](https://cei.umn.edu/staff/kris-gorman) from the *Center for Educational Innovation* at the University of Minnesota will discuss the nebulous balance between breadth and depth in statistics education.<br /><br />

- **7:45&ndash;8:00:** Discussion, wrap-up, and goodbyes
